mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comDeal(dealNum, dealSubject, userId, dealCreated, dealContent, dealPrice, dealWay, dealType, dealState, dealHitCount ) VALUES (comdeal_seq.NEXTVAL, #{dealSubject}, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{dealContent}, #{dealPrice}, #{dealWay}, #{dealType}, 1, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT dealNum, m.userId, userNick, dealSubject, dealCreated, to_char(dealPrice, 'FM999,999') dealPrice, dealWay, dealType, dealState, dealHitCount FROM comDeal d JOIN member1 m ON m.userId=d.userId ORDER BY dealNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM comDeal d JOIN member1 m ON m.userId=d.userId

SELECT dealNum, m.userId, userNick, dealSubject, dealCreated, dealContent, to_char(dealPrice, 'FM999,999') dealPrice, dealWay, dealType, dealState, dealHitCount FROM comDeal d JOIN member1 m ON m.userId=d.userId WHERE dealNum=#{dealNum}
SELECT ROWNUM, dealNum, m.userId, dealSubject, to_char(dealPrice, 'FM999,999') dealPrice FROM comDeal d JOIN member1 m ON m.userId=d.userId WHERE d.userId=#{userId} AND ROWNUM <= 3
